create short links using v6.ae

v6.ae Shortener Extension  easy way to shorten URLs!

With just one click, this extension will shorten any URL you want using the popular v6.ae service. No need to open a new tab or navigate away from your current page - simply click the extension icon, and your shortened link will be copied to your clipboard for easy sharing.

Features
★ Easily shorten any link
★ Shareable QR code

QR Codes
Creating QR codes using a v6.ae extension is a quick and easy process. Simply click on the extension icon while on the page you want to create a QR code for and select the option to generate a QR code. 

The extension will automatically create a QR code for the current page's shortened URL, which you can then save or download as an image file.
